title: Oat porridge with dates and cardamom

ingredients.content: 30 - 40 g pistachio nuts, unsalted, or other type of nuts (e.g. walnuts, almonds etc.)

preparations.content: Place pistachio nuts into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place dates into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place milk, sugar, cardamom and oat flakes into mixing bowl and cook <b>9 min/90°C//speed 2<b>.
Add reserved chopped dates and cook <b>2 min/90°C//speed 2<b>.
Add blossom water and mix <b>20 sec//speed 3<b>. Transfer the mixture into a large bowl or into individual bowls, sprinkle with chopped pistachio nuts and serve warm.

hintsAndTricks: The porridge will keep thickening as it rests, if it is not served immediately adjust the quantity of milk in <b>step 3.<b>
Replace the milk with <b>1 tin<b> sweetened condensed milk <b>(400 g)<b> and <b>450 g water.<b> Omit sugar or adjust it to taste.

Single portion: reduce the amount of ingredients to <b>30 g dates<b>, <b>40 g large oat flakes<b>, <b>210 g milk<b>, a pinch of ground cardamom and <b>1 tsp<b> blossom water. Follow the same procedure as described in the preparation and in <b>step 3<b> cook <b>6 mins/90°C//speed 2<b>.<b>
